name: Superconductor
description:
Experience a stylish rhythm game at the subatomic level

Play as an electron looping through atomic orbits while avoiding dangerous neutralizing ions. Follow the beat and aim for the top score by picking up energy bonuses and completing levels as quickly as possible.

Built in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47th game jam.

Theme: Stuck in a loop

Controls

Escape - back

Space - restart

Left Mouse - jump to new atom / increase orbit level

Right Mouse - decrease orbit level

Credits Devs

Andrew Cunningham

Mitchell Nursey

Music

Adam Caflisch

Known issues

If in full screen pressing Escape to leave level will also exit full screen.

Pressing quit on the main menu will cause a JavaScript error (fun).
